title: Remindera, timers etc. notification not working how its supposed to work.
content: So when i press "all clear"; notification such as reminders and timers etc. Are also getting cleared. So the reminder or timer notification gets dismissed ( the reminder or timer does not stop or gets marked as done). So then i don't see the notification anymore and i forget about what i have to do. Missed several doctors appointments cuz of that. And message notification or whatsapp notification dont reappear when i dont answer them. Please help google is love google is life please help.
